item.title: A Story of Pork Belly: Overview of the Commodities Market
item.author: Vanessa Tang,
item.description: Above: Figure 1: The increasing demand for pork belly has led to large gyrations in prices Pork bellies – yes, the pork that comes from the belly of a pig, was an iconic commodity for the futures market’s representation in pop-culture. While it might be surprising that the financial market involves …
